text:
"*Avoid This Brand: Worst After-Sales Service Experience*

I'm extremely disappointed with the after-sales service of [Revolt rv400]. My bike's battery stopped working, and I've been waiting for FIVE MONTHS for repairs. To make matters worse, they don't even offer a replacement!

As a result, my bike has been gathering dust in my backyard for months. It's become a mere ornament, a toy that I'm unable to use. The lack of support from the company is appalling.

If you're considering purchasing a bike from this brand, THINK TWICE. The inconvenience and frustration I've experienced are not worth the hassle.

Rating: 1/5 (and that's being generous)"
author: @abhishekvaghela6751
